output.sentences: To celebrate the last day of school, the kids gave a party for their teachers.
Everyone waited patiently in line to get their food.
It was a great atmosphere - everyone was happy to be at the party.
Of course, eventually it was time for regular studies.
It was the last day, but they had to sit through on class, at least!
